about_the_game:
Dark Eyed Angels is a first person horror game. Heavily inspired by the gray alien genre.

We're unleashing this demo to hear from you, our brave players. Are the mechanics hitting the mark? Do the jump scares make you scream or yearn for more? Your feedback will shape the darkness to come.

Step into the shoes of Casey, a young man forced to move in with his grandfather due to a housing crisis. But what starts as a simple relocation quickly spirals into a nightmare beyond imagination...

A linear horror experience that will leave you breathless. Inspired by the spine-chilling game play of SOMA and Outlast, and drawing from chilling accounts of real-life alien abductions, this 20-30 minute slice of terror is just a taste of the full game's horrors.

Features

  • Alien chases!

  • Dark ominous atmosphere.

  • 20-30 minutes gameplay

  • A new original take on the grey alien horror game

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scary scenes that may seem disturbing to some players and has some religious references.

name: Dark Eyed Angels Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Demo for Dark Eyed Angels a grey alien abduction survival horror game. A darker vision of the Grey Alien phenomenon.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
